name: DEATH METAL (GeekeryGaming)
description:
Demons have enslaved the human race with terrible pop music.  

Agni, the descendant of Surt the fire giant has been chosen to wield the legendary guitar crafted from a branch of Yggdrasil, the world tree but first he must prove his worth. Once you prove your worth, you must then ascend to the prime material plane to slay the ones who broke the demon code.

Death Metal is a top down game where you must slay demons with your epic guitar playing skills. 

Game Development Team:

Kevin Alvayero (AnoherZer0)

Brandon Correa

Ashley Barreto (GeekeryGaming)
